original_jd:
Job Description-

This role will blend business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. This position will focus heavily on the developing new processes with technical solutions with the vehicle configuration space. The position will utilize ML and AI to quickly develop solutions.

 • Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows). 

• Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. This includes, but is not limited to:

 • Developing and maintaining configuration specifications.

 • Creating and modifying data mappings and integrations.

 • Implementing and testing new configurations.

 • Troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues. 

• Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement. This may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools. 

• Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices. 

• Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected. Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT). 

• Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps. 

• Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Skills Required:

-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. -Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills. -Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Skills Preferred:

-Java experience -SQL experience

Experience Required:

-ML experience and implementation experience

Experience Preferred:

-Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus. -Experience with vehicle configuration is a plus.
enhanced_versions:
Role Overview:
This role is a crucial bridge between business needs and technical solutions, requiring a unique blend of business acumen and technical proficiency. As a key player in our organization, you will be responsible for ensuring our systems accurately reflect business requirements and operate efficiently. Your primary focus will be on developing new processes and leveraging advanced technologies, such as machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI), to deliver innovative solutions within the vehicle configuration space.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows).
- Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues.
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, involving database querying, report generation, and data visualization using appropriate tools.
- Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices.
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, and actively participate in user acceptance testing (UAT).
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps.
- Work collaboratively with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to identify and address complex issues
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills, enabling effective stakeholder engagement and cross-functional teamwork
- Proficiency in translating complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and their application in a fast-paced, dynamic environment

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience with Java and SQL, demonstrating a solid understanding of programming and database concepts
- Familiarity with machine learning and artificial intelligence techniques, and the ability to leverage these technologies to drive process improvements

Required Experience:
- Minimum 3-5 years of experience in a role that blends business and technical responsibilities, with a proven track record of delivering effective system configurations and solutions
- Demonstrated expertise in understanding and documenting complex business processes, and translating them into technical requirements

Preferred Experience:
- Experience working with vehicle configuration systems and processes, providing a deeper understanding of the industry and its unique challenges
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and their application in a fast-paced, dynamic environment

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific systems, tools, and technologies required for this role]

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional team environment with a focus on continuous improvement and innovation
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team, with a strong emphasis on proactive communication and problem-solving
- Willingness to adapt to changing priorities and requirements, and a demonstrated ability to thrive in a dynamic, fast-paced setting

Role Overview:
This role is a strategic bridge between business objectives and technical solutions, requiring a unique combination of business acumen, analytical thinking, and technical expertise. As a key member of our team, you will be responsible for ensuring our systems and processes accurately reflect the evolving needs of our business and operate at peak efficiency. Your primary focus will be on leveraging advanced technologies, such as machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI), to develop innovative solutions within the vehicle configuration space.

Key Responsibilities:
- Engage extensively with stakeholders across various departments to deeply understand their business requirements, gather detailed specifications, and document them using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows).
- Translate complex business needs into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including designing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and thoroughly testing new configurations, and promptly resolving any configuration-related issues.
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and opportunities for improvement, utilizing database querying, reporting, and data visualization tools to uncover valuable insights.
- Proactively recommend process improvements and system enhancements that optimize business efficiency, leveraging your technical expertise and understanding of industry best practices.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including developers, IT support, and other stakeholders, to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of all system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support knowledge sharing and future enhancements.
- Actively participate in user acceptance testing (UAT) to validate that configurations meet business requirements and function as expected.

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to dissect complex issues and devise innovative, data-driven solutions
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration abilities, enabling you to effectively engage with stakeholders from diverse backgrounds
- Proficiency in translating technical information into clear, concise, and easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Strong working knowledge of Agile methodologies and their application in a fast-paced, dynamic environment

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience with Java and SQL, demonstrating a deep understanding of programming and database concepts
- Familiarity with machine learning and artificial intelligence techniques, and the ability to leverage these technologies to drive process improvements and optimize system performance

Required Experience:
- Minimum 5 years of experience in a role that combines business and technical responsibilities, with a proven track record of delivering effective system configurations and solutions
- Demonstrated expertise in eliciting, documenting, and translating complex business requirements into technical specifications

Preferred Experience:
- Prior experience working with vehicle configuration systems and processes, providing valuable industry-specific knowledge and context
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and their implementation in a fast-paced, continuously evolving environment

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific systems, tools, and technologies required for this role]

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional team environment with a focus on continuous improvement, innovation, and delivering exceptional results
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team, with a strong emphasis on proactive communication, problem-solving, and adaptability to changing priorities
- Willingness to take on challenges, learn new skills, and contribute to the overall growth and success of the organization

Role Overview:
This is a strategic role that blends business acumen, technical expertise, and a passion for innovation. As a key member of our team, you will be responsible for ensuring our systems and processes not only meet the evolving needs of our business but also push the boundaries of what's possible. Your primary focus will be on leveraging advanced technologies, such as machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI), to develop cutting-edge solutions within the vehicle configuration space, driving significant improvements in efficiency, accuracy, and customer experience.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to deeply understand their business challenges, requirements, and pain points, and document them using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows).
- Translate complex business needs into innovative technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including designing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and thoroughly testing new configurations, and quickly resolving any configuration-related issues.
- Analyze existing data using sophisticated techniques, such as predictive analytics and data mining, to uncover hidden insights, identify trends, and pinpoint areas for optimization.
- Proactively recommend and implement process improvements and system enhancements that drive significant gains in business efficiency, leveraging your technical expertise and deep understanding of industry best practices.
- Lead cross-functional teams, including developers, IT support, and other stakeholders, to ensure seamless implementation and ongoing support of system configurations, fostering a collaborative and innovative work environment.
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of all system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support knowledge sharing, future enhancements, and organizational growth.
- Actively participate in user acceptance testing (UAT) and champion a culture of continuous improvement, ensuring configurations not only meet but exceed business requirements.

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to tackle complex challenges and devise innovative, data-driven solutions
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration abilities, enabling you to effectively engage with and influence stakeholders at all levels
- Proficiency in translating technical information into clear, concise, and easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- In-depth understanding of Agile methodologies and their application in a fast-paced, dynamic environment, with a proven track record of driving successful implementation

Preferred Skills:
- Extensive hands-on experience with Java and SQL, demonstrating a deep understanding of programming and database concepts
- Expertise in machine learning and artificial intelligence techniques, and the ability to leverage these technologies to drive significant process improvements and optimize system performance

Required Experience:
- Minimum 7-10 years of experience in a role that combines business and technical responsibilities, with a proven track record of delivering innovative, high-impact system configurations and solutions
- Demonstrated expertise in eliciting, documenting, and translating complex business requirements into technical specifications, while driving continuous improvement

Preferred Experience:
- Prior experience working with vehicle configuration systems and processes, providing valuable industry-specific knowledge and context
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and their implementation in a fast-paced, continuously evolving environment, with a track record of leading successful transformations

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific systems, tools, and technologies required for this role]

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional team environment with a strong focus on continuous improvement, innovation, and delivering exceptional results
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team, with a strong emphasis on proactive communication, problem-solving, and adaptability to changing priorities
- Willingness to take on challenges, learn new skills, and contribute to the overall growth and success of the organization, often serving as a subject matter expert and thought leader
